Nzambani Rock

Explore one of the beautiful sceneries in Kitui County.
It is a stone outcrop standing approximately 600feet (183meters)above the ground.

Visit us to see and know more

Services 0ffered

Nzambani Rock is a recreational centre. We offer many services to our visitors, there are Sports areas, Clubs and Restaurant.

Sports

Nzambani is now fully equiped with sport facilities.

Restaurant

Our restaurant has many rooms which are of different size. For now we can approximately serve 20 families at a night

Environment

Our clean environment is attractive to all our customers.

Some picture of our environment
